Imports SQLAlchemy for database operations and Jinja2 for templating.
Full API spec:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: Ticket Management API
  version: 1.0.0
paths:
  /login:
    post:
      summary: Login a user
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                username:
                  type: string
                password:
                    type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: User logged in successfully
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/LoginResponse'
    /create_ticket:
      post:
        summary: Create a new ticket
        requestBody:
          required: true
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  user_id:
                    type: integer
                  title:
                      type: string
                  description:
                        type: string
        responses:
          201:
            description: Ticket created successfully
    /get_open_tickets:
      get:
        summary: Get all open tickets
        responses:
          200:
            description: Open tickets returned
    /get_closed_tickets:
      get:
        summary: Get all closed tickets
        responses:
          200:
            description: Closed tickets returned
    /update_ticket:
      put:
        summary: Update a ticket's status or details
        requestBody:
          required: true
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  ticket_id:
                    type: integer
                  new_description:
                      type: string
        responses:
          200:
            description: Ticket updated successfully
    /change_status:
      put:
        summary: Change a ticket's status
        requestBody:
          required: true
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  ticket_id:
                    type: integer
                  status_change:
                      type: string
                  user_id:
                        type: integer
                  change_at:
                          type: datetime
        responses:
          200:
            description: Status change successful
    /create_report:
      post:
        summary: Create a new report for a ticket
        requestBody:
          required: true
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  ticket_id:
                    type: integer
                  reporter_user_id:
                      type: integer
        responses:
          201:
            description: Report created successfully
    /update_status_change:
      put:
        summary: Update a status change for a report
        requestBody:
          required: true
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  report_id:
                    type: integer
                  new_status_change:
                      type: string
                  user_id:
                        type: integer
                  change_at:
                          type: datetime
        responses:
          200:
            description: Status change updated successfully
    /get_open_tickets_count:
      get:
        summary: Get the count of open tickets
        responses:
          200:
            description: Count of open tickets returned
    /get_closed_tickets_count:
      get:
        summary: Get the count of closed tickets
        responses:
          200:
            description: Count of closed tickets returned
